hostname P1
buggy

logging buffered debug 10240
logging file debug /rtr/run/logs/freertr.log
logging rotate 655360000 /rtr/run/logs/freertr.old
logging syslog informational local7 172.20.20.1
!
crypto rsakey rsa import $v10$
!
crypto dsakey dsa import $v10$
!
crypto ecdsakey ecdsa import $v10$TUhNQ0FRRUVIMHJTczY0WlBza0tvR0FpSVdUZFRudXIxNlJOTE9RZkxWakVScHVPWEFLZ0J3WUZLNEVFQUFxaFJBTkNBQVI1TjZsT0JHN3VpWFFGRWpYR2FpNUZ1RXhSMDVHVnNnS2huUWtxeGNWYmkrb3Q3VDR6YXZBcnR0UmtZVnVMYURSd0hLT1FIWkl3ZWdIK1NuTE1HVHll
!
aaa userlist usr
 username rare
 username rare password $v10$cmFyZQ==
 exit
!
scheduler errors
 time 600000
 delay 30000
 command clear errors freerror@nop.hu
 start
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL4
 sequence 10 permit 0.0.0.0/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL6
 sequence 10 permit ::/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit

bundle 10
 exit
!
bundle 100
 exit
!
bundle 11
 exit
!
bundle 110
 exit
!
vrf definition DEF_SEGROUT
 exit
!
vrf definition OOB
 exit
!
router ospf4 10
 vrf DEF_SEGROUT
 router-id 100.100.100.10
 traffeng-id 0.0.0.0
 segrout 500 base 12000
 area 0 enable
 area 0 spf-ecmp
 area 0 segrout
 ecmp
 exit
!
interface loopback1
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 100.100.100.10 255.255.255.255
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 passive
 router ospf4 10 segrout index 10
 router ospf4 10 segrout node
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle10
 description ASBR1
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 10.100.135.1 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 700
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle100
 description PE_A
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 10.100.128.2 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 2000
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle11
 description ASBR2
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 10.100.135.5 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 700
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle110
 description PE_B
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 10.100.129.2 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 2000
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit

interface ethernet1
 description [B100]PE_A_eth2
 cdp enable

 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet2
 description [B110]PE_B_eth2
 cdp enable
 bundle-group 110
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit

interface ethernet255

 no shutdown
 no log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet3

 no shutdown

!
interface ethernet4

 no shutdown

 exit
